item.title: What Ingo is up to
item.description: ðŸ“– What I’m reading Palo Alto - Malcom Harris Built to Move - Juliet Starrett and Kelly Starrett ðŸ“º What I’m watching Woman of the Dead Ted Lasso - Season 3 Succession - Season 4 ðŸ§° What I’m making Designed a piece in FreeCad to increase the mounting height of the external Carplay Display mounted on the Dashboard of our car React App to provide a simple Game Score Card for board or card games Experimenting with SVG layer separation based on color of the image ðŸ”¬ What I’m learning Visited the Exhibition about Ansel Adams in San Francisco Front End Master - TypeScript (this is a lot of stuff) Transition my old Synology NAS to a new TrueNAS machine
